attributes.action: Keep the DEVIL BOYS in prison for life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these boys seriousle assaulted 3 young boys in a week leaving them traumatised and one in a coma They have been given a minimum of 5 years which should be changed to life. When released they will have a life the 3 boys they attacked will not

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
